content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 6, León 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 6, León 0.
Goal!  Barcelona 6, León 0. Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sergi Samper.
Substitution, León. Mauricio Castañeda replaces Juan González.
Substitution, León. Arturo Ortíz replaces Jonny Magallón.
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Derley (León).
Corner,  León. Conceded by Marc Bartra.

Foul by Derley (León).
Xavi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
